mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spot_like (account_id, content_id, area_code, title, image, like_date) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{spotLikeDto.contentId}, #{spotLikeDto.areaCode}, #{spotLikeDto.title}, #{spotLikeDto.image}, now() );
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM spot_like WHERE account_id = #{accountId} and content_id = #{contentId};
mapper.sql: SELECT SL.like_id, SL.account_id, SL.content_id, SL.area_code, SL.title, SL.image, SL.like_date, SUB.like_count FROM spot_like AS SL INNER JOIN ( SELECT content_id, count(content_id) AS like_count FROM spot_like WHERE content_id IN ( SELECT content_id FROM spot_like WHERE account_id) GROUP BY content_id ) AS SUB ON SUB.content_id = SL.content_id
mapper.select: SELECT count(content_id) as like_count FROM spot_like WHERE content_id = #{contentId};
